header.title: Introduction to cosEventDomain

section.title: Overview
section.p: The cosEventDomain application is a Event Domain Service compliant with the OMG Service CosEventDomainAdmin.

section.title: Purpose and Dependencies
section.p: CosEventDomain is dependent on Orber, which provides CORBA functionality in an Erlang environment.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: To fully understand the concepts presented in the documentation, it is recommended that the user is familiar with distributed programming and CORBA.
